Module Fit_Diet_Planner
Package object

Class User

java.lang.Object
object.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user with personal details and a schedule. Provides methods to calculate and interpret BMI values.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    User(String name, int age, double weight, double height, Schedule schedule)
    Creates a new user with the given details.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String name, int age, double weight, double height, Schedule schedule)
      Creates a new user with the given details.
      Parameters:
      name - the user's name
      age - the user's age
      weight - the user's weight in kilograms
      height - the user's height in centimeters
      schedule - the user's schedule

  • Method Details

    • calculateBMIScore

      public double calculateBMIScore(double weight, double height)
      Calculates the Body Mass Index (BMI) using the given weight and height.
      Parameters:
      weight - the weight in kilograms
      height - the height in centimeters
      Returns:
      the BMI score rounded to two decimals
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if weight or height are non-positive

    • getBMIResult

      public String getBMIResult(double weight, double height)
      Returns the BMI category based on the given weight and height.
      Parameters:
      weight - the weight in kilograms
      height - the height in centimeters
      Returns:
      a string representing the BMI category

    • calculateBMIScore

      public double calculateBMIScore()
      Calculates the BMI score using the user's stored weight and height.
      Returns:
